Theme settings

Choosing from existing themes

Here, you can choose a theme for your site or application. There are some default themes which you could select. Choosing each one from the drop-down list, you will see a preview of the theme in the page. 

Choose different themes and see the changes in different parts (toolbars, buttons, texts, ...). 

 

When you choose your favorite theme click on the 'APPLY' button to set the theme.

 

Defining a new theme

In addition to the default themes, you are provided with the capability of defining new themes. Depending on use, you may want to define a new one.

To define a new theme click on 'THEME MANAGER'.
